verses.verse: Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H5358>"Take<s%> <S%H5360>full<s%> <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> on the <S%H4084>Midianites;<s%> <S%H310>afterward<s%> you will be <S%H622>gathered<s%> to your <S%H9415>people.<s%>"

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H9139>"Arm<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> from <S%H854>among<s%> you for the <S%H6635>war,<s%> that they may <S%H1961>go<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H4080>Midian,<s%> to <S%H5414>execute<s%> the Lord's <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> on <S%H4080>Midian.<s%>
"A <S%H505>thousand<s%> from each <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4294>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> you shall <S%H7971>send<s%> to the <S%H6635>war.<s%>"

So there were <S%H4560>furnished<s%> from the <S%H505>thousands<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> from each <S%H4294>tribe,<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H9139>armed<s%> for <S%H6635>war.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> them, a <S%H505>thousand<s%> from each <S%H4294>tribe,<s%> to the <S%H6635>war,<s%> and <S%H6372>Phinehas<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> to the <S%H6635>war<s%> with them, and the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H3627>vessels<s%> and the <S%H2689>trumpets<s%> for the <S%H8643>alarm<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

So they <S%H6633>made<s%> <S%H6633>war<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H4080>Midian,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and they <S%H2026>killed<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2145>male.<s%>

And they <S%H2026>killed<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%> <S%H5921>along<s%> with the [rest of] their <S%H2491>slain:<s%> <S%H189>Evi<s%> and <S%H7552>Rekem<s%> and <S%H6698>Zur<s%> and <S%H2354>Hur<s%> and <S%H7254>Reba,<s%> the <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian;<s%> they also <S%H2026>killed<s%> <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1160>Beor<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7617>captured<s%> the <S%H802>women<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%> and their <S%H2945>little<s%> <S%H2945>ones;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H929>cattle<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H4735>flocks<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H2428>goods,<s%> they <S%H962>plundered.<s%>
Then they <S%H8313>burned<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H4186>where<s%> they <S%H4186>lived<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H2918>camps<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>
And they <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4455>prey,<s%> both of <S%H120>man<s%> and of <S%H929>beast.<s%>

And they <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H7628>captives<s%> and the <S%H4455>prey<s%> and the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and to <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> and to the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to the <S%H4264>camp<s%> at the <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are by the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> opposite <S%H3405>Jericho.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5387>leaders<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out to <S%H7122>meet<s%> them <S%H413>outside<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> was <S%H7107>angry<s%> with the <S%H6485>officers<s%> of the <S%H2428>army,<s%> the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H505>thousands<s%> and the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H3967>hundreds,<s%> who had <S%H935>come<s%> from <S%H6635>service<s%> in the <S%H4421>war.<s%>
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, "Have you <S%H2421>spared<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5347>women<s%>?

<S%H2005>"Behold,<s%> <S%H2007>these<s%> <S%H1961>caused<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> through the <S%H1697>counsel<s%> of <S%H1109>Balaam,<s%> to <S%H4560>trespass<s%> <S%H4604><s%> against the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in the <S%H1697>matter<s%> of <S%H6465>Peor,<s%> so the <S%H4046>plague<s%> was among the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

<S%H6258>"Now<s%> therefore, <S%H2026>kill<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2145>male<s%> among the <S%H2945>little<s%> <S%H2945>ones,<s%> and <S%H2026>kill<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> who has <S%H3045>known<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4904>intimately.<s%> <S%H2145><s%>
"But <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2945>girls<s%> <S%H802><s%> <S%H834>who<s%> have not <S%H3045>known<s%> <S%H2145>man<s%> <S%H4904>intimately,<s%> <S%H2145><s%> <S%H2421>spare<s%> for yourselves.

"And you, <S%H2583>camp<s%> <S%H4480>outside<s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%> <S%H3605>whoever<s%> has <S%H2026>killed<s%> any <S%H5315>person,<s%> and <S%H3605>whoever<s%> has <S%H5060>touched<s%> any <S%H2491>slain,<s%> <S%H2398>purify<s%> yourselves, you and your <S%H7628>captives,<s%> on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> and on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H2398>purify<s%> for yourselves <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H899>garment<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3627>article<s%> of <S%H5785>leather<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of goats' [hair,] and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3627>articles<s%> of <S%H6086>wood.<s%>"

Then <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H6635>war<s%> who had <S%H935>gone<s%> to <S%H4421>battle,<s%> <S%H2088>"This<s%> is the <S%H2708>statute<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded<s%> Moses: <S%H4872><s%>
<S%H389>only<s%> the <S%H2091>gold<s%> and the <S%H3701>silver,<s%> the <S%H5178>bronze,<s%> the <S%H1270>iron,<s%> the <S%H913>tin<s%> and the <S%H5777>lead,<s%>

<S%H3605>everything<s%> that can <S%H935>stand<s%> the <S%H784>fire,<s%> you shall <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H784>fire,<s%> and it shall be <S%H2891>clean,<s%> but it shall be <S%H2398>purified<s%> with <S%H4325>water<s%> for <S%H5079>impurity.<s%> But <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H935>stand<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%> you shall <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H4325>water.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> your <S%H899>clothes<s%> on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> and be <S%H2891>clean,<s%> and <S%H310>afterward<s%> you may <S%H935>enter<s%> the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>"
Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"You and <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> and the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the fathers' [households] of the <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> <S%H5375>take<s%> a <S%H7218>count<s%> of the <S%H4455>booty<s%> that was <S%H7628>captured,<s%> both of <S%H120>man<s%> and of <S%H929>animal;<s%>
and <S%H2673>divide<s%> the <S%H4455>booty<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H4421>warriors<s%> who <S%H3318>went<s%> out to <S%H4421>battle<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation.<s%>

"And <S%H7311>levy<s%> a <S%H4371>tax<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> from the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> who <S%H3318>went<s%> out to <S%H4421>battle,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> in <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> of the <S%H120>persons<s%> and of the <S%H1241>cattle<s%> and of the <S%H2543>donkeys<s%> and of the <S%H6629>sheep;<s%>
<S%H3947>take<s%> it from their <S%H4276>half<s%> and <S%H5414>give<s%> it to <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> as an <S%H8641>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"And from the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of Israel's <S%H4276>half,<s%> you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H270>drawn<s%> out of every <S%H2572>fifty<s%> of the <S%H120>persons,<s%> of the <S%H1241>cattle,<s%> of the <S%H2543>donkeys<s%> and of the <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> from <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H929>animals,<s%> and <S%H5414>give<s%> them to the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> who <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>"
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

Now the <S%H4455>booty<s%> that <S%H1961>remained<s%> <S%H3499><s%> from the <S%H957>spoil<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H5971>men<s%> of <S%H6635>war<s%> had <S%H962>plundered<s%> was 675000 <S%H6629>sheep,<s%>
and 72000 <S%H1241>cattle,<s%>
and 61000 <S%H2543>donkeys,<s%>

and of <S%H120>human<s%> <S%H5315>beings,<s%> of the <S%H802>women<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> had not <S%H3045>known<s%> <S%H2145>man<s%> <S%H4904>intimately,<s%> <S%H2145><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5315>persons<s%> were 32000.
And the <S%H4275>half,<s%> the <S%H2506>portion<s%> of those who <S%H3318>went<s%> out to <S%H6635>war,<s%> was [as follows: ] the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H6629>sheep<s%> was 337500,
and the Lord's <S%H4371>levy<s%> of the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> was 675,
and the <S%H1241>cattle<s%> were 36000, from which the Lord's <S%H4371>levy<s%> was <S%H8147>72.<s%> <S%H7657><s%>
And the <S%H2543>donkeys<s%> were 30500, from which the Lord's <S%H4371>levy<s%> was <S%H259>61.<s%> <S%H8346><s%>
And the <S%H120>human<s%> <S%H5315>beings<s%> were 16000, from whom the Lord's <S%H4371>levy<s%> was <S%H8147>32<s%> <S%H7970><s%> <S%H5315>persons.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> the <S%H4371>levy<s%> [which was] the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>'s <S%H8641>offering<s%> to <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as the Lord had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
As for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of Israel's <S%H4276>half,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H2673>separated<s%> from the <S%H376>men<s%> who had <S%H6633>gone<s%> to <S%H6633>war<s%> –
now the congregation's <S%H4275>half<s%> was 337500 <S%H6629>sheep,<s%>
and 36000 <S%H1241>cattle,<s%>
and 30500 <S%H2543>donkeys,<s%>
and the <S%H120>human<s%> <S%H5315>beings<s%> were 16000 –

and from the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of Israel's <S%H4276>half,<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H270>drawn<s%> out of every <S%H2572>fifty,<s%> <S%H4480>both<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> and of <S%H929>animals,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them to the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> who <S%H8104>kept<s%> <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

Then the <S%H6485>officers<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were over the <S%H505>thousands<s%> of the <S%H6635>army,<s%> the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H505>thousands<s%> and the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H3967>hundreds,<s%> <S%H7126>approached<s%> <S%H4872>Moses;<s%>

and they <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> "Your <S%H5650>servants<s%> have <S%H5375>taken<s%> a <S%H7218>census<s%> of <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> are in our <S%H3027>charge,<s%> and <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> of us is <S%H6485>missing.<s%>

"So we have <S%H7126>brought<s%> as an <S%H7133>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4672>found,<s%> <S%H3627>articles<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> <S%H685>armlets<s%> and <S%H6781>bracelets,<s%> <S%H2885>signet<s%> <S%H2885>rings,<s%> <S%H5694>earrings<s%> and <S%H3558>necklaces,<s%> to <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for <S%H5315>ourselves<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>"
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H2091>gold<s%> from them, <S%H3605>all<s%> kinds of <S%H4639>wrought<s%> <S%H3627>articles.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2091>gold<s%> of the <S%H8641>offering<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H7311>offered<s%> up to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> from the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H505>thousands<s%> and the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H3967>hundreds,<s%> was 16750 <S%H8255>shekels.<s%>
The <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H6635>war<s%> had <S%H962>taken<s%> <S%H962>booty,<s%> <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> for himself.

So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H2091>gold<s%> from the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H505>thousands<s%> and of <S%H3967>hundreds,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> it to the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%> as a <S%H2146>memorial<s%> for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
